meanings.definition: Not able to be predicted or foreseen.
meanings.sent1: The weather in spring is so unpredictable.
meanings.sent2: Life is full of unpredictable events.
meanings.sent3: The unpredictable weather made planning a picnic impossible.
meanings.sent4: Her mood swings were as unpredictable as the weather.
meanings.sent5: The unpredictable nature of the stock market keeps investors on their toes.

meanings.definition: Things or people that cannot be predicted or foreseen.
meanings.sent1: The unpredictables in the movie kept the audience on edge.
meanings.sent2: The unpredictables of life make it exciting.
meanings.sent3: Dealing with unpredictables can be challenging but also fun.
meanings.sent4: She navigated through the unpredictables of the city with ease.
meanings.sent5: The unpredictables in the experiment led to unexpected results.
